CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7250IXR610',"Link To Optics Guidance Of 7250 IXR-6-10 : "+ HYPERLINK($Label.PRM_Url+'0152M000003lYoo',"7250 IXR-6-10"),IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7250IXR46',"Link To Optics Guidance Of 7250 IXR-6-10 : "+ HYPERLINK($Label.PRM_Url+'0152M000003lYoo',"7250 IXR46"),""))
CustomField.label: Optics/Pluggable Guidance
